public class TagManagementImpl
extends TagManagementBase

    • Method Detail

      • createTagInDatabaseNewTx

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public Tag createTagInDatabaseNewTx(TagTO tag,
                                                                             TagStore tagStore)
        Creates a tag in the database. Instead of calling this method directly, storeTag should be used. Throws a DataIntegrityViolationException if the tag already exists The operation is run in a new transaction.
        Parameters:
        tag - The TO describing the tag to create filled with all details.
        tagStore - The tag store.
        Returns:
        The tag created within the database.

      • findTag

        public Tag findTag(Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the tag.
        Returns:
        The tag by it's id.

      • findTag

        public TagData findTag(Long id,
                       Locale locale)
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the tag.
        locale - The locale to use.
        Returns:
        The localized tag as TagData or null if the tag does not exist.

      • findTag

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public Tag findTag(String name,
                                                 TagStoreType.Types type)
        Finds a tag
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag.
        type - Type of the tag.
        Returns:
        The found tag or null.

      • findTagByTagStoreNewTx

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public Tag findTagByTagStoreNewTx(String tagStoreTagId,
                                                                           String tagStoreAlias)
        Retrieves a tag by its TagStore definition. The operation is run in a new transaction.
        Parameters:
        tagStoreTagId - the ID of the within the tag store
        tagStoreAlias - the alias of the tag store
        Returns:
        the found tag or null if not found

      • getCount

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public int getCount(Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the tag.
        Returns:
        Returns the usage count of the given tag within the users access restrictions.

      • removeNoteTag

        public void removeNoteTag(long oldTagId,
                          Long newTagId)
                   throws AuthorizationException,
                          TagNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: TagManagement
        Remove a note tag. Optionally a new tag can be provided to add it to the notes as a replacement of the old tag. If the tag to remove does not exist nothing will happen. If there are followers of the oldTag these users will automatically follow the newTag if a new tag should be set.
        Parameters:
        oldTagId - the ID of the tag to remove
        newTagId - optional ID of tag to add the notes from which the other tag is removed
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user or a client manager
        TagNotFoundException - in case newTagId is referring to non-existing tag

      • renameTag

        @Transactional(propagation=SUPPORTS)
public void renameTag(long tagId,
                                                           String newName)
                                                    throws AuthorizationException,
                                                           TagNotFoundException,
                                                           TagAlreadyExistsException
        Description copied from interface: TagManagement
        Rename an existing internal note tag.
        Parameters:
        tagId - Id of the tag.
        newName - The new default name.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user or a client manager
        TagNotFoundException - in case the tag to rename does not exist
        TagAlreadyExistsException - in case the there is already an existing internal note tag with the new name

      • storeTag

        public Tag storeTag(TagTO tag)
             throws TagNotFoundException,
                    TagStoreNotFoundException
        Creates a new tag based on the given parameters or updates an existing tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag to create.
        Returns:
        The created tag.
        Throws:
        TagNotFoundException - TagNotFoundException.
        TagStoreNotFoundException - TagStoreNotFoundException.
